description: Seminar is an original radio drama anthology show spanning every genre and style with one new episode every month!
title: Seminar: An original anthology show by Pendant Productions

episodes.title: Episode Ninety-five
episodes.description:
Episode Ninety-five - Death lurks around every corner. Featuring "Murder, She Summoned" by Dave Morgan and  "After the End" by Justin Sparks!

episodes.title: Episode Eighty-nine

episodes.title: Episode Sixty-nine
episodes.description:
Episode Sixty-nine - Sometimes our choices are a matter of life and death, and sometimes we learn what we might be capable of. How far would you go? Featuring "The Apprentice's Choice" by Matthew Hocking and "Better Than Sex" by V.C. Morrison.

episodes.title: Episode Sixty-eight
episodes.description:
Episode Sixty-eight - Sometimes it's hard to see outside our own experiences, and we don't always get it quite right. But we're forever changed by the attempt. Featuring "Looking for Freedom" by Dave Morgan and "Tic Toc" by Ashley Victoria Robinson.

episodes.title: Episode Sixty-seven
episodes.description:
Episode Sixty-seven - Seeing things as they are takes courage - but so does admitting how you really want things to be. Featuring "Cut Your Teeth" by Darian Lindle and "The Places You Won't Go" by Susan Bridges.

episodes.title: Episode Sixty-six
episodes.description:

episodes.title: Episode Sixty-five
episodes.description:

episodes.title: Episode Ten COMMENTARY
episodes.description: Director Kathryn Pryde and executive producer Jeffrey Bridges with live commentary on Seminar episode 10

episodes.title: Episode Nine
episodes.description:
Episode Nine - Cows chew the cud and literary characters mock your sexual prowess, or lack thereof. It's an examination of humor that gives voice to inner desires like... farmhands are hot. And so is Erik. Featuring "Ruminations" and "Don't Come Back Until I Have a Penis".

episodes.title: Episode Eight
episodes.description:
Episode Eight - The Trashman has a body! And a bathroom. What a guy! And do you have any idea what "Detective Mac" scripts go for on the black market? $300! It's true. Featuring "Roxy and the Trashman", act 2, and "Detective Mac", part 2.

episodes.title: Episode Seven
episodes.description:
Episode Seven - When looking for work, take jobs from mysterious strangers at your own peril. And sometimes the most horrible thing about a murder is what you don't know. Featuring "Cargo" and "Enmity".

episodes.title: Episode Six
episodes.description:
Episode Six - When aliens invade, who you gonna call? The sales team, that's who! And just what does Sandy Valentine want with Detective Mac? It must be pretty serious, because dames don't rebuild stairs for just anyone! Featuring "Conference Call" and "Detective Mac".

episodes.title: Episode Five
episodes.description:
Episode Five - Old friends get together for one last hurrah, but there's always the little problem of ego to get in the way. And be wary of falling down garbage chutes... but should it happen, well, maybe you'll be lucky enough to meet the Trashman. Featuring "The Reunion" and "Roxy and the Trashman".

episodes.title: Episode Four
episodes.description:
Episode Four - How well does the Instructor understand comedy, or for that matter, warm caffeinated beverages? Spontaneous inquiry: what is humor? Featuring "Black Joe Coffee" and "Coffee Break".

episodes.title: Episode Three
episodes.description:
Episode Three - The Instructor takes things down a dark road and into a world of murder and violence, double-crosses and abusive booyfriends... and the chance to turn the tables on those who've wronged you. Featuring "Walk with Death" and "Game's Over".

episodes.title: Episode Two
episodes.description:
Episode Two - Who is rapping, rapping at the chamber door? A dark and foreboding creature, or a gentle but imaginary friend? Seminar tackles the ways in which we cope with loss and despair... or fail to. Featuring "The Raven" and "Genji".

episodes.title: Episode One
episodes.description:
Episode One - What happens when Satan has your phone number, and knows all of your darkest, dirtiest secrets? Whatever it is, it's got to be worse than when your ex-partner in crime gets out of jail and has a plan for one more big score that could set you up for life... or does it? Featuring "The Sound of the Click" and "The Big Payday".
